item.description:
When you RSVP, please note your ETA. 

(I will try to be there earlier, around 5:45pm.)

If you RSVP and your situation changes, please update your RSVP so that people on the waiting list will be moved up.


If the weather is questionable, I will email everyone who has RSVPed as to whether or not the meetup is still off or on - ONE HOUR - before the meetup start time.

 

This meetup is for intermediate players ( levels 3.5 and higher) in competitive play. Because this is a small park (only four courts),  the maximum sign-up will be limited to 8 (with an automated waitlist). Thanks.

 

Depending on the the number of people who show up, we will play doubles or a mix of doubles and singles. Please be aware that we have no way of reserving two courts so the earlier you can arrive, the better.

 

See the bottom of this original post for an exact court location description, parking and public transportation.
item.name: Tues PM Intermediate (3.5 or higher)
